You can ask me about everything that is associated with subclasses.
What do you want from me?

With some help of the gods, leaving the same state level Division, you can change class. Profession Change Division (Certificate must be replaced with Professions)

New subclass created at level 40. Add subclass (recreate)

When the subclass level is reset to 40 . Add a subclass after removal (reset)
